metric_size.name: Count
metric_size.title: The width of an edge represents the count as relative to other edge, where a bigger edge represent more counts

metric_color.name: Anomaly score
metric_color.title: The color of an edge represents the anomaly score as relative to other edges, with interpolation from green (ok) to red (not ok)
